Here are relevant links for teachers teaching North Saami.
OAHPA-davvi - Interaktiivalaš prográmmat maiguin sáhttá hárjehallat sániid ja grammatihka.
OAHPA-davvi - Interactive programs for training words and grammar
Oahpa giela (Kursa) - oahppanbálgát universitehta studeanttaide geat leat oahpahallame sámegiela, muhto bálgát sáhttet heivet earáide maiddái.
Oahpa giela (Kursa) - course paths for university students learning North Saami.
Jietnafiillat ja liŋkkat hárjehusaide. Čilgehusat leat dáro- ja sámegillii.
Explanations are in Norwegian and Saami, and one path has explanations in Finnish.
Ovtta bálgás leat čilgehusat suomagillii.
Audiofiles and links to exercises.
